headline: Assessing Lululemon Athletica (LULU) Valuation After Mixed Short And Long Term Share Returns
summary: Why lululemon athletica (LULU) is on investors’ radar today lululemon athletica (LULU) has drawn increased attention after a stretch of mixed share performance, with a 1 day gain, a small pullback over the past week, and stronger moves over the month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for lululemon athletica. That recent 30 day share price return of 10.95% and 90 day share price return of 21.74% sit against a 1 year total shareholder return decline of 46.67%, suggesting shorter term...
